jv.thirdParty.acmeEncoders

Class PpmEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.thirdParty.acmeEncoders.ImageEncoder
      • jv.thirdParty.acmeEncoders.PpmEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageConsumer

    public class PpmEncoder
extends ImageEncoder
    Write out an image as a PPM. Writes an image onto a specified OutputStream in the PPM file format.
